text: Hey everybody!
I just wanted to take a minute to sayyyyyy....

Hey everybody!
I just wanted to take a minute to give some updates about our production schedule lately.
Don't mind whatever I'm wearing right now.
We were filming something else today.
Tom and I are going to be heading into the field to Peru on a field expedition,
so while we're gone we're going to be uploading some episodes
that were created by our exhibitions department
who accompanied me to Kenya at the beginning of the year.
So you'll see some of that footage, which is kind of a teaser for the rest of the footage to come.
And I also wanted to say a big thank you,
because we are approaching a quarter of a million subscribers here on The Brain Scoop,
and we might hit that number when I'm out of the country.
So I just wanted to take a minute to say thank you so much for sticking with us over the last 21 months.
It has been unreal.
And that's it! See ya on the other side.
*Caaww, caaww...*
*Caaww, caawwww.....*
